Name: Madama Qiao
Content:
Qiao Sum - also known as Madame Qiao or the Lady of the Swamps - is the de facto ruler of the Undercity of Pont d'Amitié. She is an older water genasi from Feng Zhou, who has lived in Pont d'Amitié's undercity even since before the liberation of Demareilles.

She leads the Rats des Marais - the Swamp Rats, the Undercity's largest organized gang. Through both diplomacy and power, she enforces the absolute personal freedom that everyone in the Undercity possesses. By her ideals, every person is free to do as they please, including the freedom to rob and kill. Madame Qiao follows these ideals absolutely.
